verbose_text: However, expressing GFP tagged Clu proteins lacking the Clu (DeltaClu) or TPR (DeltaTPR) domains did not rescue the clumping phenotype very well, indicating these domains are necessary for proper mitochondrial localization (XREF_FIG C, D, arrows; XREF_FIG F).
evidence: Clu proteins lacking the Clu (DeltaClu) or TPR (DeltaTPR) domains did not rescue the clumping phenotype very well, indicating these domains are necessary for proper mitochondrial localization
